Header: 68 Division Continues Practice of 'Daana' to Children’s Home
Content: 68 Division troops of the Security Force Headquarters - Mullaittivu (SFHQ-MLT) with the consent of all serving troops have volunteered to supply three major meals on every Saturday to the Iniya Walwu Illam Child Care Centre (Children’s Home) in Puthukkudiyiruppu with the hope of promoting goodwill and reconciliation. The project has been continuing for some time, considering the humanitarian aspect. Major General H.R.N Fernando, General Officer Commanding (GOC), 68 Division is closely supervising the charity programme after he was appointed the GOC. The inmates in the children’s home include 19 mentally-retarded kids.
